name: The sum of even positive and odd negative numbers of the array
instruction:
Write a function `sumEvenPositiveOddNegative` that takes one parameter - an array.

The array is of arbitrary length and consists of positive and negative integers.

The function should return the sum of even positive and odd negative integers in the array.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
sumEvenPositiveOddNegative([-21, 24, -25, 28]) // (-21) + 24 + (-25) + 28 = 6
sumEvenPositiveOddNegative([-17, -18, -19, -20]) // (-17) + (-19) = -36
sumEvenPositiveOddNegative([-2, -4, 5, 7]) // 0
```
